H0.text: Which guitar innovator and player has a range of Gibson Guitars named after him. B.B. King

H1.text: Which guitar innovator and player has a range of Gibson Guitars named after him. Chuck Berry

H2.text: Which guitar innovator and player has a range of Gibson Guitars named after him. Eddie Van Halen

H3.text: Which guitar innovator and player has a range of Gibson Guitars named after him. Les Paul

A4.text: Gibson's Ted McCarty was the chief designer of the guitar, which was based on Paul's drawings and later dubbed the Gibson Les Paul.

A5.text: a more modernistic model was introduced (today called the Gibson SG), but then still bearing the Les Paul name
